entry.bio: Darksoft is a multi-instrumentalist songwriter and producer who creates dreamy indie rock sounds..

Husband Lost At Sea is the music based project from Patrick Shannon, better known from heavier bands such as Hold Down The Ocean and All Else Failed. It began as a traditional singer/songwriter concept but has expanded in a way that suggests influence from indie and even prog rock. The debut EP The Universe Is Telling Old Friends To Reach Out To Me was released Friday, Nov. 21st. Photo credit: @hardwork_photo

GRACE VONDERKUHN is a 3-piece rock band from Wilmington, Delaware. Uniting in 2016, the outfit consists of Grace Koon, songwriter, singer, and guitarist, Brian Bartling, bassist, and Dave McGrory, drummer and singer. They combine elements of shoegaze, post-punk, and psych with a sharp pop sensibility. The band has toured the US, played SXSW, Audiotree and NonCOMM, and shared the stage with Geese, Sheer Mag, Camp Cope, and Shame to name a few.

Cooper Moore is a singer/songwriter/producer from Chicago, Illinois. Emerging on the scene from a young age, Cooper's take on indie rock is immediately recognized. With a grunge grit, alt-country twang, folk sensibilities, pop arrangements, and a taste for electronica, he creates with a vulnerable confidence in his tastes & idiosyncrasies. Cooper's debut The Long Run EP, released in June, places his lyrics and knack for melody at the forefront. Toeing the lines between irony and earnestness, humor and sincerity, The Long Run is a voice instantly recognized as authentic. Moore, now based in New York City, continues to grow as a songwriter, producer, performer, and world builder. With a slate of shows across the country in the spring, he is gearing up to release his debut LP in the summer of 2026. Cooper Moore's full-length debut is a collection of memories & discoveries that view experience as a forager views a forest. The record, exhibiting an awe for life, nature, and imperfection, follows the same distinguishing ethos as his past works.
Psychopomp is a punk rock trio formed in Philadelphia PA. Their influences include Ramones, The Stooges, Black Flag, Adolescents and GBH to name a few.
Trunk metal out of Horsham, PA. Read our Q&A with Trunk in Stories.
Hailing from Brooklyn NY, dweller. is a post-hardcore quartet that make heavy music for a heavy world â€” dweller. is Kevin Ultsh, Greg Rocco, Juan Aguilar, and Christian Cabatu.

Kief Shuvel has built a reputation on raucous guitar energy, collaborative experimentation, and a willingness to chase songs down whatever unexpected paths they present. Formed from the remnants of earlier project Gypsy Wig, the Jersey Cityâ€“based band has been quietly building momentum and a fanbase since 2021. With â€œOrange Blossom,â€ their first new release since 2024â€™s Dig, Kief Shuvel come back swinging with a sharp, ultra-swaggering new single.

Owl Talons is a 3-piece punk band from Chester County, PA. Best friends since birth, August Dunn (vocals and guitar), Brandon Uhler (vocals and drums), and Elon Dunn (bass) formed Owl Talons in early 2023. Their original songs capture their connection, youthful perspective, and angst, bringing organic songwriting with rawness, attitude, and authenticity.

Roe Knows Best is the brainchild of singer-songwriter, Roe Oâ€™Brien, indelibly New Jersey in sound, style, and attitude. In May of 2020, Roe released the Muscle Memory EP. Her next follow-up culminated in the Northbound EP in July of 2022. In June of 2025 she released Weekend at Mauchieâ€™sâ€¦Vol. 1, a collaborative EP co-written & recorded with fellow friend & Essex County, NJ native, Max Rauch (MAUCH). Her debut full-length album, Now Arrivingâ€¦at Secaucus Junction, is currently out on all digital streaming platforms.

Tucked In is an indie-folk band based in Phoenixville, PA. Fresh off a 23-date summer tour across Pennsylvania and beyond, the band just released their debut album Friends, Dogs and Lovers. This collection of songs tells the story of the bandâ€™s beginning in New York City to their present lives in Pennsylvania. They will be kicking off 2026 with a show at Johnny Brendaâ€™s in Philadelphia on 1/30.

Gun-Shy Butterfly melds sugary harmonies and urgent hooks with fuzzed-out guitars for a tough and tuneful sensibility evoking the 1990s alt-rock, grunge, and Riot Grrrl scenes. The Philadelphia-based duoâ€™s debut six-song EP Uncomplicated, salutes their ease of communication and collaboration, and its title also references Gun-Shy Butterflyâ€™s specialty: no frills, open-hearted, loud-guitar rock.

Rasan in the Heyday is a delightful blend of a pop, punk and grunge, delivered with a DIY attitude. Lead by singer/songwriter Rasan Allbritton, Rasan in the Heyday was formed in the end of 2016, and quickly gained a following playing basements and bars around Southeastern PA. Rasan in the Heydayâ€™s debut EP, released in April 2018, blends the raw intensity of 90s grunge with sing-along melodies perfect for a Friday night. For fans of Neutral Milk Hotel, Tegan and Sara, Kevin Devine and The Front Bottoms.
Uncle was a punk band from Bucktown, PA. Uncle went to college.
